sentences.sContent: With its prowess, Hezbollah can now blackmail the government into giving it more political power.
sentences.sContent_eng: With its prowess, Hezbollah can now blackmail the government into giving it more political power.
sentences.sCn: 真主党展示了自己的威力，如今可以勒索政府赋予它更多的政权。

sentences.sContent: And above all, we must stop disparaging digital prowess just because some of us over 40 don't happen to possess it.
sentences.sContent_eng: And above all, we must stop disparaging digital prowess just because some of us over 40 don't happen to possess it.
sentences.sCn: 最关键的是，我们不能仅仅因为一些40岁以上的人没能掌握数码科技，就贬低数码科技的威力。
